descrizione: A quarter-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun — just the way Dave intended.
A half-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun. More meat means more to love.
Three quarters of a pound* of fresh, never frozen beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, and onion on a toasted bun. Use both hands!
A half-pound* of fresh beef, American cheese, 6 pieces of crispy Applewood smoked bacon, ketchup, and mayo. Carnivores rejoice!
A quarter-pound of fresh beef, American cheese, plenty of Applewood smoked bacon, ketchup, and mayo. Like Baconator®, like Son.
Two patties of fresh, never frozen beef with cheese, ketchup, mustard, pickle, and onion. It’s double the fresh beef, stacked with deliciousness.
Fresh beef, Applewood smoked bacon, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, and mayo. It’s a favorite of bacon lovers everywhere.
Fresh beef topped with cheese, pickles, onions, tomatoes, crisp lettuce, ketchup, and mayo. It’s big flavor at a junior price.
Fresh beef topped with cheese, pickles, onion, ketchup, and mustard on a toasted bun. It’s done just right, and just the right size.
Fresh beef topped with pickles, onion, ketchup, and mustard on a toasted bun. It’s done just right, and just the right size.
A sizzling chicken breast grilled to perfection, with thick Applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, crisp lettuce, and tomato, all on a toasted bun. Go grilled. Go home happy.

A juicy, lightly breaded chicken breast taken over the top with thick Applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, crisp lettuce, and tomato, all on a toasted bun. A club favorite that’s anything but boring.

A juicy chicken breast marinated and breaded in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices to deliver more flavor inside and out, topped with thick Applewood smoked bacon, Asiago cheese, creamy ranch sauce, crisp lettuce, and tomato, all on a toasted bun. So hot you’ll wanna give your mouth a heads up.

A juicy chicken breast marinated and breaded in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices to deliver more flavor inside and out, cooled down with crisp lettuce, tomato, and mayo. It’s the original spicy chicken sandwich, and the one you crave.
A juicy, lightly-breaded chicken breast, crisp lettuce and tomato, and just enough mayo, all on a toasted bun. It’s extra comfy comfort food.
Juicy white meat, lightly breaded and seasoned, topped with crisp lettuce, and mayo. More than delicious, and just the right size.

100% white-meat chicken breaded and marinated in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices. Served with your choice of six dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard or Side of S’Awesome®. The Internet icon is back for a hot minute.

100% white-meat chicken breaded and marinated in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices. Served with your choice of six dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard or Side of S’Awesome®. The Internet icon is back for a hot minute.

100% white-meat chicken breaded to crispy perfection and served with your choice of 6 dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard, or Side of S’Awesome®. They’re trending in our restaurants and Twitter feed alike.

Made fresh daily with Wendy’s signature lettuce blend, crisp red and green apples, dried cranberries, roasted pecans, crumbled blue cheese, and grilled chicken breast hot off the grill, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Pomegranate Vinaigrette. An unbeatable pick.

Nutrition and allergen information is inclusive of all ingredients in this salad including two packets of dressing on the full-size salad and one packet on the half, which come on the side.

Made fresh daily with romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, Italian cheeses, crunchy Parmesan crisps, and creamy Caesar dressing. One bite will tell you why it’s king of more than just the Romaines.
Natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries served hot and crispy. The world loves them for a reason.
Perfectly seasoned and positively irresistible. Red’s kind of our thing, you know.
Strawberries served ripe and chilled. It’s a burst of summer flavor whenever you want them.
Our natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries topped with warm, creamy cheese sauce, shredded cheddar, and crispy Applewood smoked bacon. The only fries worthy of the Baconator name.
A blend of 100% Arabica beans from central and south America, medium-roasted to bring out all the best flavors.
Brewed to be rich and smooth without the caffeine.
1% milk with 30% of the daily calcium requirement.
A favorite since forever with 25% the daily calcium requirement.

The Chocolate Frosty® was born out of Dave’s desire for a signature dessert to go with his vision of the perfect meal. Thick enough to use a spoon, smooth enough to use a straw, and perfect when enjoyed on the end of a fry.

The vanilla version of our signature frozen dessert. Cool and creamy don’t do it justice. This is the smooth, thick, sweet dessert masterpiece that goes with everything on our menu. You deserve a dessert this good, so go ahead.
Give yourself a wholesome start to the day with our Fresh Baked Oatmeal Bar made with whole oats, sweet blueberries and tart cranberries.
A rich, soft, fresh-baked cookie full of semi-sweet chunks of chocolate, baked in-house. Grandma would love them.
The traditional favorite. Soft, fresh-baked, simple, and perfect.
A soft, fresh-baked chocolate cookie with chocolate chunks, baked in-house. Chocolate and chocolate, together at last.

100% white-meat chicken breaded and marinated in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices. Served with your choice of six dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard or Side of S’Awesome®. The Internet icon is back for a hot minute.
Hot and fluffy potato topped with creamy cheese sauce, shredded cheese, and Applewood smoked bacon. Because nothing goes with a potato like cheese, more cheese, and also bacon.
Hot and fluffy potato with shredded cheddar cheese and rich, creamy cheese sauce on top. It’s savory and delicious no matter how you skin it.
Hot and fluffy potato topped with Wendy’s signature meaty, flavorful chili, rich, creamy cheese sauce, and shredded cheddar. This spud’s your best bud.
A hot, fluffy potato topped with the classic combination of chives, and sour cream. It’s a side, it’s a meal, it’s a potato’s potato. Potato.
nome: Sour Cream and Chive Baked Potato

descrizione: The cold, refreshing, sparkling classic that America loves.
The great taste of Coca-Cola® with zero calories.
A signature blend of 23 flavors makes it truly unique.
The cold, refreshing flavors of lemon and lime, perfectly blended.
Change up your routine with the bright, bubbly, fruity flavor of Fanta® Orange.
Explosive fruit flavors and 100% of the vitamin C your body needs.
Real lemonade with no artificial ingredients or preservatives.
A lighter take on the sweet, tart American classic.
Brewed to perfection, cool and refreshing any time.
Brewed perfectly and sweetened just the way you like it.
Our all-natural lemonade flavored with real strawberries.
Natural, pure, refreshing, and delicious.
Juicy white meat, lightly breaded and seasoned, topped with Applewood smoked bacon, crisp lettuce, tomato, cheese, and mayo. A classic taste, perfectly reinvented.
Herb-marinated grilled chicken breast topped with smoky honey mustard, crisp spring mix, and tomato, served on a warm toasted bun. See if it isn’t the best chicken sandwich you’ve ever had.

Made fresh daily with Wendy’s signature lettuce blend, shredded cheddar cheese, diced tomatoes, salsa, sour cream, tortilla chips, and our famous, hearty chili. A fresh take on tacos perfect for Tuesdays, Wednesdays, or any other days for that matter.

Nutrition and allergen information is inclusive of all ingredients in this salad.
The satisfying simplicity of good, honest, hot, fluffy baked potato perfection. Ingredients: Potato.

Made fresh daily with Wendy’s signature lettuce blend, pepper jack cheese, diced tomatoes, cool, creamy avocado, Applewood smoked bacon, and grilled chicken breast hot off the grill, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Southwest Ranch Dressing. It’s zesty and Southwesty!

Nutrition and allergen information is inclusive of all ingredients in this salad including two packets of dressing on the full-size salad and one packet on the half, which come on the side.
The same great taste as Coke Classic® but with zero calories.
A sweet, spiced favorite that’s stood the test of time.
A selection of crisp, juicy sliced apple pieces, perfect as a snack or a side. Great pick!
Our natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries topped with our hearty chili and rich, creamy cheese sauce. Easy to love. Hard to beat.

100% white-meat chicken breaded to crispy perfection and served with your choice of 6 dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard, or Side of S’Awesome®. They’re trending in our restaurants and Twitter feed alike.

A fluffy buttermilk biscuit smothered in white pepper gravy and grilled breakfast sausage. It’s what southern hospitality tastes like.
A fresh-cracked grade A egg on a fluffy buttermilk biscuit with Applewood smoked bacon and melted American cheese. Rise and shine with a hearty favorite.
A fresh-cracked grade A egg on a fluffy buttermilk biscuit with grilled sausage and melted American cheese. Meet your new morning favorite.
A crispy, chicken fillet, perfectly seasoned and topped with maple honey butter on a fluffy buttermilk biscuit. It’s sweet, it’s savory, and it’s a great reason to get out of bed in the morning.
Natural-cut, skin-on potatoes cooked to perfection and seasoned with cracked black pepper and garlic powder.
Grilled, breakfast sausage on a soft buttermilk biscuit. Simple breakfast perfection.
Vanilla Frosty® topped with Chocolate Chunk Cookie bites and Ghirardelli® Chocolate Sauce.

A quarter-pound* of fresh beef, crispy fried onions and American cheese, covered in sweet and smoky barbecue sauce all on a toasted bun.  This stampede of flavor is the best barbecue hamburger in the west–or north or south or east for that matter.
Slow steeped, to be extra rich and super-smooth, then served over ice to be extra refreshing and invigorating.
Smooth, cold-brewed coffee swirled with our legendary vanilla Frosty mix and served over ice.
Smooth, cold-brewed coffee swirled with our legendary chocolate Frosty mix and served over ice.
Grape, strawberry, and watermelon juices unite for a delicious, organic juice.
A fresh-cracked grade A egg, Applewood-smoked bacon, and melted American cheese on a warm breakfast roll. A tried and true reason to rise.
A fresh-cracked grade A egg, grilled sausage and melted American cheese on a warm breakfast roll. It’s how mornings were meant to begin.

Herb-marinated grilled chicken breast, Applewood smoked bacon, lettuce, tomato, muenster cheese, cool buttermilk ranch and creamy avocado. It’s the best thing to happen to the BLT since abbreviations.

A juicy, lightly breaded chicken breast marinated and breaded in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices topped with crispy onions, muenster cheese, pickles, and covered in a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce. There are reasons the west was wild, and this sandwich is as rowdy as any of them.

A fresh-cracked grade A egg and Applewood smoked bacon covered in creamy swiss cheese sauce on a flaky croissant bun. Breakfast basics worth waking up early for.

A juicy chicken breast, Applewood smoked bacon, and maple butter on a flaky croissant bun. A little sweet. A little savory. A lot good.
Scrambled eggs, melty cheese, and perfectly seasoned breakfast sausage wrapped in a warm, soft, flour tortilla. Conveniently delicious, and deliciously convenient.

Grilled sausage, American cheese, Applewood smoked bacon, a fresh-cracked grade A egg, (deep breath) more cheese and more bacon all covered in swiss cheese sauce. Don’t just break your fast. Destroy it.
100% Pure squeezed pasteurized orange juice. A delicious orange juice with a taste that’s the next best thing to fresh squeezed.
Fluffy buttermilk biscuit spread with maple honey butter. The kind of down-home breakfast that melts in your mouth and makes you reminisce about the farm, even if you’re from the city.

Our all-natural lemonade mixed with beachy flavors like strawberries, dragon fruit and passion fruit.
